mapper.select: select id, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by, deleted_at, sort, stable, status, memo, plugin_sort, plugin_code, plugin_name, plugin_file from sys_gen_plugin_list where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_gen_plugin_list(created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by, deleted_at, sort, stable, status, memo, plugin_sort, plugin_code, plugin_name, plugin_file) values (#{createdAt}, #{createdBy}, #{updatedAt}, #{updatedBy}, #{deletedAt}, #{sort}, #{stable}, #{status}, #{memo}, #{pluginSort}, #{pluginCode}, #{pluginName}, #{pluginFile})

insert into sys_gen_plugin_list(created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by, deleted_at, sort, stable, status, memo, plugin_sort, plugin_code, plugin_name, plugin_file) values
(#{entity.createdAt}, #{entity.createdBy}, #{entity.updatedAt}, #{entity.updatedBy}, #{entity.deletedAt}, #{entity.sort}, #{entity.stable}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.memo}, #{entity.pluginSort}, #{entity.pluginCode}, #{entity.pluginName}, #{entity.pluginFile})

insert into sys_gen_plugin_list(created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by, deleted_at, sort, stable, status, memo, plugin_sort, plugin_code, plugin_name, plugin_file) values
(#{entity.createdAt}, #{entity.createdBy}, #{entity.updatedAt}, #{entity.updatedBy}, #{entity.deletedAt}, #{entity.sort}, #{entity.stable}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.memo}, #{entity.pluginSort}, #{entity.pluginCode}, #{entity.pluginName}, #{entity.pluginFile})
on duplicate key update created_at = values(created_at), created_by = values(created_by), updated_at = values(updated_at), updated_by = values(updated_by), deleted_at = values(deleted_at), sort = values(sort), stable = values(stable), status = values(status), memo = values(memo), plugin_sort = values(plugin_sort), plugin_code = values(plugin_code), plugin_name = values(plugin_name), plugin_file = values(plugin_file)
mapper.update:
update sys_gen_plugin_list
created_at = #{createdAt},
created_by = #{createdBy},
updated_at = #{updatedAt},
updated_by = #{updatedBy},
deleted_at = #{deletedAt},
sort = #{sort},
stable = #{stable},
status = #{status},
memo = #{memo},
plugin_sort = #{pluginSort},
plugin_code = #{pluginCode},
plugin_name = #{pluginName},
plugin_file = #{pluginFile},
where id = #{id}
